mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_contract (code, title, sign_date, type, contact_status, cycle, pay_type, party_a, party_a_principal, party_b, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date, summary, terms, file_url) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{contactStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{cycle,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyAPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyBPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_contract set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, contact_status = #{contactStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cycle = #{cycle,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a = #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a_principal = #{partyAPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b = #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b_principal = #{partyBPrincipal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terms = #{terms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select contract_id, code, title, sign_date, type, contact_status, cycle, pay_type, party_a, party_a_principal, party_b, party_b_principal, start_date, end_date, summary, terms, file_url from t_contract where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
